title: Dog Overboard: Rescue Dogs Series Book 1
description: Dog Overboard is an uplifting and encouraging story about a brave Labrador Retriever named Dock. While Dock and his owner are out on a fishing trip, Dock meets a lost duckling and decides to leave the safety of his ownerâ€™s boat to help the duckling find his family. Along the way, Dock bonds with the duckling and has a close encounter with an alligator. This story is a mix of heart and excitement and is perfect for any dog lover looking for a quick read.Dog Overboard is book 1 in the Rescue Dogs Series.
author: J.C. Millan
